title: [Resolved] League Of Legends Age Requirements
body: So LOL is a fun game to play but what is the legal age requirement for it in Australia since there's no T for Teen in Australia

replies.body:
You must be 13 years or older to play League of Legends, as per the Oceania Terms of Use.  
> THE SITE AND THE GAME ARE NOT DIRECTED AT CHILDREN UNDER 13 YEARS OF AGE, NOR DOES RIOT GAMES KNOWINGLY COLLECT INFORMATION FROM CHILDREN UNDER 13.  IF YOU ARE UNDER 13, PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT ANY PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION TO RIOT GAMES. 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse
